name: Gemini CLI
description: Install Gemini CLI, an open-source AI agent that brings the power of Google Gemini directly into your terminal with built-in tools and MCP support.

version.description: Version of Gemini CLI to install. Use 'latest' for stable, 'preview' for weekly previews, or 'nightly' for daily builds.

installGlobally.description: Install Gemini CLI globally using npm. Set to false to skip global installation.
